attributes.action: Police Public Parks then the Public can enjoy a "Safe Walk in the Park"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Police should protect the public in Parks.
Many are Dangerous, sexual predators prowl for innocent children & youths, toilets have been closed due to these men.
Some men are using the parks for dirty sexual meetings.
The public are being forced out,jail these men.
